title: About
text:
All transcriptions are taken from:
Jones, Daniel. 2011. Cambridge English Pronouncing Dictionary. (Ed.) Peter Roach. 18th ed. Cambridge: Cambridge University Press.
For the source code, visit the GitHub repository.

title: Phonological Dictionary
text:
# Define the dictionary data in R
dictionary <- data.frame(
  word = c("example", "phonology", "transcription"),
  ipa = c("/ɪɡˈzæmpəl/", "/fəˈnɑlədʒi/", "/trænˈskrɪpʃən/"),
  notes = c("Stress on second syllable", "Greek origin", "")
)

# Convert dictionary to JSON
dictionary_json <- jsonlite::toJSON(dictionary, dataframe = "rows", auto_unbox = TRUE)
dictionary_json

[{"word":"example","ipa":"/ɪɡˈzæmpəl/","notes":"Stress on second syllable"},{"word":"phonology","ipa":"/fəˈnɑlədʒi/","notes":"Greek origin"},{"word":"transcription","ipa":"/trænˈskrɪpʃən/","notes":""}]

IPA
Notes
